metadata.title: CVE-2021-34141 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An incomplete string comparison in the numpy.core component in NumPy before 1.22.0 allows attackers to trigger slightly incorrect copying by constructing specific string objects. NOTE: the vendor states that this reported code behavior is "completely harmless."

criterions.comment: numpy package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
